body_html:
@branquinhoaa
Still getting an error when trying to create a new conf as an orga :/

UPD: my test conf (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/conferences/110) has been created with a correct gid, so maybe this error is related to the redirect.

UPD 2: I created this conf from /conferences, not /orga/conferences, which is a valid use case IMO.
body_text:
@branquinhoaa
Still getting an error when trying to create a new conf as an orga :/
UPD: my test conf (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/conferences/110) has been created with a correct gid, so maybe this error is related to the redirect.
UPD 2: I created this conf from /conferences, not /orga/conferences, which is a valid use case IMO.
body:
@branquinhoaa 
Still getting an error when trying to create a new conf as an orga :/

UPD: my test conf (https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/conferences/110) has been created with a correct gid, so maybe this error is related to the redirect.

UPD 2: I created this conf from `/conferences`, not `/orga/conferences`, which is a valid use case IMO.
